steps.name: First step
steps.content:
# Step 1: Creating a server

Something [ExpressJS](http://expressjs.com/):

    $ npm install hapi --save

Something something

 [{]: <helper> (diffStep 1.4)

#### Step 1.4: Change serve npm script to use nodemon

##### Changed package.json
```diff
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@
 ┊3┊3┊  "description": "A tutorial for creating a Tron-style game",
 ┊4┊4┊  "private": true,
 ┊5┊5┊  "scripts": {
-┊6┊ ┊    "serve": "node server.js"
+┊ ┊6┊    "serve": "nodemon server.js"
 ┊7┊7┊  },
 ┊8┊8┊  "dependencies": {
 ┊9┊9┊    "hapi": "^16.0.1"
```

[}]: #
